CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Stellar Bancorp Inc formerly, CBTX Inc is a U.S. based bank holding company. It mainly focuses on providing commercial banking solutions to local small and mid-sized businesses and professionals. The services provided by the company include business and personal deposits account, personal and business lending, mobile and online banking, merchant banking and others. The company generates a majority of its revenue from interest on loans and investments.
